examples.example: 周末我或者去爬山，或者去公园散步，享受美好的时光。

translate.english: On the weekend, I either go hiking or take a walk in the park to enjoy the wonderful time.

examples.example: 人生充满了选择，我们或者勇敢前行追求梦想，或者安于现状平淡生活。

translate.english: Life is full of choices. We either move forward bravely to pursue our dreams or be content with the present situation and live a plain life.

examples.example: 我们可以选择周末或者在家休息，或者出去游玩，让生活丰富多彩。

translate.english: We can choose to rest at home or go out to play on weekends to make life rich and colorful.
